text: ( music playing )

I need to find
my missing piece.
♪ More than a mystery ♪

- Then I hissed at her.
- ( laughter )

Yo, it's the first day
of the new school year,

and lucky you, you're looking
at the coolest kid
in the cafeteria.

There's only one person
in Seabrook as chill as me.

And she's about to walk in
right...now.

Yep, it's Addison.
Isn't she great?
Good morning, friends.

Who's ready for another
beautiful day at Seabrook High?
( all howling )

Man, werewolf howls
are the best.

Why don't we have
anything like that?

Because, Zed,
we zombies have brains.

Wait.
Werewolves have brains, too.

- I think. Wait, do we?
- Of course we do, Wynter.

Werewolves got the biggest
brains of all.

Hey, it's not a competition,
guys.

Because no one could compete
with us.
( laughter )

This year's gonna be
so awesome.

- We should celebrate.
- Yeah.
♪ Like the zombies do ♪
♪ Do it like the zombies do ♪

♪ Trim your claws
get a manicure ♪

♪ Cut your bangs
leave it on the floor ♪

♪ Now wag your tail
like a labrador ♪
♪ Do it like the zombies do ♪

♪ All you got to do
is give an inch ♪

♪ Then we gon' take it
to the top ♪
♪ Do it like the zombies do ♪
♪ Don't stop ♪
♪ Do it like the zombies do ♪
♪ Do it, do it, do it ♪
♪ Do it like the zombies do ♪
♪ The zombies do ♪

- Yeah!
- Like the zombies do, baby!

- All right!
- Yeah!

With moves like that,
the back to school pep rally

- is gonna rock.
- I know.

My first pep rally
as cheer team captain.

- Ah! BFF hug.
- Aww.

No pressure, Addison,
but this could totally

- really make or break you.
- Uh, yeah, Wynter,

that doesn't put any pressure
on her at all.

I'm not worried.
Addison will be amazing.
We'll be amazing.

Or else we'll all hear
about it from Bucky.

Not if he knows
what's good for him.

- Which he usually doesn't.
- ( laughter )

- ( door opens )
- ♪ Na-na, na-na, na-na ♪
♪ The runway walk ♪
♪ Na-na, na-na, na-na ♪

- ♪ Na-na, na-na, na-na ♪ 
- ( sniffing )
♪ The runway walk ♪
Here we go again.
